title: Table 138 - Row 1
clause_text: Provision & Location: Dimensions | Drop-off zones if provided should be at the same grade as the driveway: Min width of drop-off zone 1.5 m, and min length 4.5 m. Change in level between the drop-off and the plinth should be through a ramp of maximum gradient 1:12

headers: Drop-off zones if provided should be at the same grade as the driveway
values: Min width of drop-off zone 1.5 m, and min length 4.5 m. Change in level between the drop-off and the plinth should be through a ramp of maximum gradient 1:12
